subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Mets scored five runs in the first, then not another one until a five-run outburst in the ninth in a game that offered glimpses into how maddeningly frustrating this team can be.
snippet: The Mets scored five runs in the first, then not another one until a five-run outburst in the ninth in a game that offered glimpses into how maddeningly frustrating this team can be.
